itunes:title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE: Investing
title: MONEY WITH MICHELLE: Investing
description: We're back with one of our favorite regulars, Michelle! Michelle aka Daddy Styles is talking to us today about investing. Having money or keeping a hold of your money is one thing but having your money work for you is a whole other ball game. Michelle breaks down the traditional investment vehicles most people know: 401K, Roth IRA, and so many more. He shows us that as money holders, we have options. And as entrepreneurs, the best time to put our money to work for us is now. And believe it or not, he may have gotten Stew to give up store-bought coffee and it just might make him a millionaire! This is an episode you're not gonna want to miss.

itunes:author: JZ Styles
